meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marie Peterson Joe Schmitz Stanton Korn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #438.

td.p: Marie Peterson, a medical technical translator from Hartland, Wisconsin
Joe Schmitz, a helicopter pilot and maintenance officer from Fort Bragg, North Carolina
Stanton Korn, an attorney from Studio City, California

tr.td: BRITISH ISLES
BIRDS
3-LETTER WORDS
FACTS & FIGURES
THE FLINTSTONES
"FIRE"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Since she usually winds down the day with a Scotch, J & B gave this p.m. their billionth bottle')

[Laughter]

[The song was played again going into the break.]

"Fly, Robin, Fly"

Marie
')

[Laughter.]
(Alex: No, you blazed through that in beautiful fashion.)

hard work

Marie
')

div.onmouseover:

satire (comedy)

Joe
')
